passives.name: Drain
passives.effects: Restore {{as|1 mana}} every second. Dealing damage to an enemy champion increases the restoration to {{as|2 mana}} for the next 5 seconds. If you cannot gain mana, {{tip|healing|heal}} for{{ft|45% of the value|{{as|{{ap|1*0.45}}|hp}} every second, increased to {{as|{{ap|2*0.45}}|hp}} when dealing damage to an enemy champion}}instead.

passives.name: Helping Hand
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].

effects_structured.raw: Restore {{as|1 mana}} every second. Dealing damage to an enemy champion increases the restoration to {{as|2 mana}} for the next 5 seconds. If you cannot gain mana, {{tip|healing|heal}} for{{ft|45% of the value|{{as|{{ap|1*0.45}}|hp}} every second, increased to {{as|{{ap|2*0.45}}|hp}} when dealing damage to an enemy champion}}instead.
Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].
